content:
Slow cooker recipes are perfect for a weekend! I've got some delicious suggestions that feature peppers and onions as main ingredients. Here are a few ideas to get you started:

**1. Chili con Carne with Peppers and Onions**

A classic slow cooker recipe! Add diced peppers and onions to your favorite chili recipe for an extra boost of flavor. You can use ground beef, ground turkey, or vegetarian options like black beans or sweet potatoes.

**2. Slow Cooker Fajitas**

Place sliced peppers, onions, and your favorite protein (chicken, beef, or tofu) in the slow cooker with some fajita seasoning. Cook on low for 6-8 hours, and serve with warm flour or corn tortillas, sour cream, and salsa.

**3. Pepper and Onion Chicken Tacos**

Add diced peppers and onions to the slow cooker with boneless chicken breasts, taco seasoning, and diced tomatoes. Cook on low for 6-8 hours, then shred the chicken and serve with tortillas, shredded cheese, and your favorite toppings.

**4. Slow Cooker Stuffed Peppers**

Fill bell peppers with a mixture of cooked rice, ground beef or turkey, diced onions, and spices. Place them in the slow cooker with some tomato sauce and cook on low for 6-8 hours.

**5. Beef and Pepper Stew**

Add sliced peppers and onions to the slow cooker with beef cubes, potatoes, and your favorite stew seasonings. Cook on low for 8-10 hours, then serve with crusty bread or over mashed potatoes.

**6. Slow Cooker Jambalaya**

This spicy rice dish is perfect for a weekend! Add diced peppers and onions to the slow cooker with sausage, chicken, rice, and your favorite jambalaya seasonings. Cook on low for 6-8 hours, then serve with crusty bread and a side salad.

**7. Roasted Pepper and Onion Soup**

Yes, you can even make soup in a slow cooker! Add roasted peppers and onions to the slow cooker with chicken or vegetable broth, cream, and spices. Cook on low for 4-6 hours, then blend until smooth. Serve with crusty bread or as a side dish.

These are just a few ideas to get you started. You can always adjust the recipes to fit your taste preferences and dietary needs. Happy slow cooking!
